name: Astroquartz® II 507
description: Astroquartz® II 507 has evstablished itself as the recognized leader in pure (99.9% +) silica grade fabrics. The electrical, thermal, and strength properties of Astroquartz® are unparalleled. Astroquartz® can be found in many groundbreaking applications including to assist commercial aviation connectivity and military aircraft communications, heat shields for orbital and martian space explorers, and as thermal protection for sensors and other temperature-sensitive parts. Astroquartz® fabrics are certifiable to AMS 3846. Astroquartz® fabrics established the use of high purity silica in fabric form.
